message.body: Hello you! If you are in the cities tonight and around, some of us are meeting at Salut in St. P. Feel free join and bring whoever!
Still on family vacation, dammit. So sad! I'll see you soon though!!
I don't know of a plan for tomorrow, but I think a few of us (Travis, Sarah Tengblad and Luke, whoever else) are gonna meet at Cooper Pub in St Louis Pk @ 9-ish
That's for tonight, cuz Sarah and Luke leave tomorrow morning for Aruba. :-)
Oh and then they get engaged?
Haha I was thinking that... Not to be outdone by her sister's elopement...

Typical Tengblad. ;) 9 might be hard for me to make tonight but I'll definitely be there tomorrow. Eric said he's on board for Brave if you are, but we should maybe picnic in the early evening / afternoon

Heyyy!!! Tickets for Angela Gulner with strings is at hobt.org, then click on tickets, and then choose today's date, it's called something like "things in the night" - this guy studied puppetry in china on a Fulbright. He's legit.
Haha okay sounds good! Evidently I now what sort of project I should have been pursuing when I applied...
